e-editiones

Text

Turtle | RDF/XML | N-Triples | JSON-LD | GitHub
text:
a
owl:Ontology
dct:contributor
Roberta Padlina, project coordinator, software developer, Basel University, Switzerland
dct:creator
Hans Cools, MD, knowledge engineer, ontologist, software developer, Basel University, Switzerland
dct:description
Formal description of text in broadest sense, general subclasses, related classes, and properties.
dct:license
http://creativecommons.org/ licenses/ by/ 3.0/
skos:note
Representation of text as object instead of literal data element, enabling relating it to other things
Text structure, text editing, and text roles are described in respective ontologies (en)
dct:publisher
Universities of Basel, Bern, and Zürich, Switzerland
dct:title
An ontology about text
owl:versionInfo
2020-06-11

Classes

text:AgentCiter
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Role of a human agent, person or group, citing a text.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text:
rdfs:subClassOf
human:AgentRole
text:Citation
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Copy of a text expression, mostly a part of it, in another text expression, with reference to the first expression.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text:
skos:note
A citation can also be referred to from the source text, having an identifier linked to both the citation reference of the source and the citation.
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:ContentStructure
text:CopiedText

rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment

rdfs:isDefinedBy

rdfs:subClassOf
document:Structure
concept:Identifier

Instances

text:characterSize
a
rdfs:Datatype
rdfs:comment
Datatype to type a character literal's size.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text:
rdfs:label
character size datatype (en)
skos:note
E.g. “10”^^sa:characterSize. Used in combination with other other character features.
rdfs:subClassOf
xsd:positiveInteger

a
owl:DatatypeProperty
rdfs:comment
